cont.entity_a: Cleans easily. Dishwasher safe. Easily disassembles for cleaning.
cont.entity_b: Easy to use and clean. Easy to disassemble and clean.

cont.entity_a: Extracts a lot of juice. Juices both small and large fruits.
cont.entity_b: Juices thoroughly. Ideal for frequent use and can handle large quantities of citrus.

cont.entity_a: Design allows juice to go directly into an attached measuring cup. Volume markings on the cup are difficult to read. Stable on the counter due to rubberized bottom.
cont.entity_b: Tall design may be challenging to store.

cont.entity_a: Parts are durable and last for years with proper care. Plastic top may warp in the dishwasher.
cont.entity_b: Sturdy construction but some metal parts are not rust-proof. Solid construction, but plastic parts may break over time. Durable and recommended for both home and commercial use.

cont.entity_a: Good for small juicing tasks but not ideal for large grapefruits.
cont.entity_b: Not suitable for large grapefruits and pomegranates. Effective for medium to small fruits.
Requires regular maintenance to prevent rust.

cont.entity_a: Reversible reamer with two sizes for different fruits. Some seeds and pulp may fall into the cup, requiring additional straining.
cont.entity_b: Short handle provides good torque. High leverage makes juicing easy. Handles a wide range of citrus fruits efficiently.
Metal cone may corrode with acidic juices.
